newsitem.title: USA: Novell CFO denies rumors he is leaving.
newsitem.headline: Novell CFO denies rumors he is leaving.

text.p: Jim Tolonen, chief financial officer at Novell Inc, on Wednesday denied a published report that he was leaving the company.
"I'm here. I have not been asked to leave and I have not chosen to leave," Tolonen told Reuters by telephone from his office in San Jose, California.
Rumors circulated that Tolonen would be leaving after a published report appeared in Computer Reseller News, a trade publication.
Tolonen said he had not been contacted by the author of the article.

He also said he gets along well with Novell's new chief executive, Eric Schmidt. "We're both very busy. We're all working hard to turn Novell around," he said, adding that he has been traveling quite a bit on behalf of the company.
